description: This notification is used for events involving security
events. The included objects provide more detailed
information about the event.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwSecurityNotification HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicEventTime s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicSecurityEventType i 1 HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicEventDescription s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicEventDetailsTableRow u 9999

description: The time that the event occurred.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicEventTime

description: The type of security-related event that this row contains.
If the event is not security-related this object will not
be instantiated.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicSecurityEventType

description: A description of the event. The value of the object may
be a zero-length string.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicEventDescription

description: A pointer to a row in the table containing details
about this event. Generally, the table will be the
cfwNetEventsTable but a Cisco-defined table may also
appear here. If there there is no more detailed
information for this event the value of this object
will have the value {0 0}.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicEventDetailsTableRow

description: This notification is used for events involving security
events. Send out firewall enable or disable event in
Interzone.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwInterzoneStatusNotification HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicEventTime s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicSecurityEventType i 1 HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwInterZoneName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicEventDescription s EXAMPLE

description: The time that the event occurred.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicEventTime

description: The type of security-related event that this row contains.
If the event is not security-related this object will not
be instantiated.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicSecurityEventType

description: This object represents the name of a firewall Interzone.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwInterZoneName

description: A description of the event. The value of the object may
be a zero-length string.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FIREWALL-MIB::hwFwBasicEventDescription
